javanews.events.gui
Class Client_SetDatabase

java.lang.Object
  javanews.events.gui.Client_SetDatabase
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class Client_SetDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

This class is used to handle events where the user wants to change the data source name of the back-end database for the application.

Version:
1.000
Author:
Alex Harris (email: Alexander.J.Harris(at)btinternet.com)
